    • Method Detail

      • onOpen

        public void onOpen​(javax.websocket.Session session,
                   java.lang.String username)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   javax.websocket.EncodeException
        On open.

        Handles opening a new session (websocket connection). If the user is a known user (user management), the session added to the pool of sessions and an announcement to that pool is made informing them of the new user.

        If the user is not known, the pool is not augmented and an error is sent to the originator.

        Parameters:
        session - the web-socket (the connection)
        username - the name of the user (String) used to find the associated UserService object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        javax.websocket.EncodeException - the encode exception

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage​(javax.websocket.Session session,
                      Message message)
        On message.

        When a message arrives, broadcast it to all connected users.

        Parameters:
        session - the session originating the message
        message - the text of the inbound message

      • onClose

        public void onClose​(javax.websocket.Session session)
        On close.

        Closes the session by removing it from the pool of sessions and broadcasting the news to everyone else.

        Parameters:
        session - the session

      • onError

        public void onError​(javax.websocket.Session session,
                    java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        On error.

        Handles situations when an error occurs. Not implemented.

        Parameters:
        session - the session with the problem
        throwable - the action to be taken.
